articles.author: Anne D'Innocenzio
articles.title: Tariffs will make sneakers, jeans and almost everything Americans wear cost more, trade groups warn - AP News
articles.description: Sending children back to school in new sneakers, jeans and T-shirts is likely to cost U.S. families significantly more this fall. That's the warning from American industry groups after President Donald Trump put high tariffs on Asian countries that make most …
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Sending children back to school in new sneakers, jeans and T-shirts is likely to cost U.S. families significantly more this fall if the bespoke tariffs President Donald Trump put on lea… [+7036 chars]
